pull_requests.title: BIP48: Partially revert recent changes, move to final
pull_requests.body: As discussed on https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1835#pullrequestreview-2837827946, the addition to P2TR was incompletely specified, and BIP48 should no longer be changed. Therefore, I propose to revert the changes, and to move BIP48 to final instead.

comment_list.body: Pinging BIP author @Fonta1n3, and PR author @ben-kaufman to request review.

pull_requests.title: BIP-372: Fix references and links formatting and minor typos
pull_requests.body:
Fixed incorrect preposition in key tweaking explanation:
  - `multiplied on` → `multiplied by`
 
- Clarified BIP-340 key serialization:
  - `appending '02'` → `appending '0x02'`
 
- Removed unnecessary trailing comma in the list of output types

- Removed erroneous semicolon after URL

comment_list.body: Looks good, modulo why did you add italics, and then remove them again in the last commit ce19ffa399cff9e8b3ab07414cedd9f265b83d4e? (No strong opinion but does seem more readable with italics.)

@jonatack 
I’ve restored the italics around the reference titles as suggested. Let me know if there’s anything else you'd like adjusted.
